metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24564 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Checkmk <=2.0.0p19 contains a Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.While creating or editing a user attribute, the Help Text is subject toHTML injection, which can be triggered for editing a user.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
